creator: Titan India
descriptionHtml:
Fastrack Reflex World App currently supports only Reflex 3.0 and it doesn't support following smart bands from the Fastrack Reflex Range - Reflex 1.0, Reflex 2.0, Reflex WAV and Reflex Beat.

Fastrack Reflex 3.0, an ultimate smart band that comes with 10 sports mode tracker and level up your game with the new & improved Fastrack Reflex World App. Hit the download button, start pairing your all-new band to this app and get tracking. It comes loaded with features –

Be it any activity the 10+ Sport Modes Tracker keeps you going. Configured for every look with a two-tone design and full touch colour display, paired with stylish watch faces.
Heart Rate Monitor - Your heart might skip a beat but Fastrack Reflex 3.0 sure won’t. Track your every beat with the Auto HR feature. Comes with a handsy 5-days battery life.
Simply connect your band to the phone via the app and stay hands on with all your notification alerts.
Play, pause and switch your songs with the Music Control feature
Take remote control on your phone and start taking all your selfies in style with the Camera Control feature.
The phone finder feature ensures you never lose your phone again all with a simple tap.
Comes with a Sedentary Reminder feature to get you moving.

descriptionShort: An ultimate smart band that comes with 10 sports mode tracker
title: Fastrack Reflex World

creator: Titan India
descriptionHtml:
Fastrack Reflex World application is your perfect companion App to connect your Fastrack Reflex Smart wearable devices to your mobile device. It also manages and monitors the smart wearable device features and settings.

Use the Fastrack Reflex World application to set up and manage the following features:
- Mobile device connection/disconnection
- Software /Firmware updates
- Smart band/Smartwatch settings
- Health feature settings and data like Heart Rate, SpO2, Body Temperature etc.
- Find my Watch
- Notification type and settings, etc.
- My Fitness, Multisport & Sleep activity data sync
- Sync your health data with Google Fit / Apple Health

Install the Fastrack Reflex World application on your mobile device, then pair your smart wearable devices via Bluetooth to enjoy all of its features.

- Settings and features provided by the Fastrack Reflex World application are only available when your wearable device is connected to your mobile device. Features will not work properly without a stable connection between your wearable device and your mobile device.

The Fastrack Reflex World application supports the following devices:
-Reflex 3.0
-Reflex 2C
-Reflex Watch
-Reflex Curv

※ Some features which are device specific will be supported only with specific devices.

descriptionShort: The companion app to connect your Fastrack Reflex smart wearable devices
title: Fastrack Reflex World

creator: Titan Company Limited
descriptionHtml:
The Fastrack Reflex World application is your perfect companion app to connect your Fastrack smart wearable devices to your mobile phone. It also manages and monitors the smart wearable device features and settings. It helps you visualise your fitness activity and vitals captured by your smart wearable device so that you can keep a track of your health effectively.

Use this Fastrack Reflex World application to set up and manage the following features:

- Connection/disconnection with the smartwatch
- Software/firmware updates
- Control/modify smartwatch settings
- Access health feature settings and data like Heart Rate, SpO2, Blood Pressure, etc. (non-medical use, only for general fitness/wellness purpose)
- Turn on/off or modify notification access
- Seamlessly sync your my fitness, multi-sport and sleep data
- Sync favourite contacts from the application to watch
- Sync your health data with Google Fit
- Don’t miss out on important updates. Allow the app to send call (Phone Call permission required), SMS and third-party app notifications to the watch so that you can stay on top of your game.
- You can also manage the list of apps that you want to receive notifications from - you’re in control, always!
- Get weather updates by allowing the app to detect your location, so that you can see forecasts.

Install the Fastrack Reflex World application on your mobile device, then pair your smart wearable device via Bluetooth to enjoy all its features.

Settings and features provided by the Fastrack Reflex World application are only available when your smartwatch is connected to your mobile device. Features will not work properly without a stable connection between your smartwatch and your mobile device.

The Fastrack Reflex World application supports the following devices:

-Revolt FS1
-Limitless FS1
-Reflex Nitro
-Reflex Beat Plus
-Reflex Vox2
-Reflex Vybe
-Reflex Play Plus
-Reflex Play
-Reflex Curv
-Reflex Watch
-Reflex 2C
-Reflex 3.0

*Some features are device-specific and will be supported only with specific devices.

It helps you visualise your fitness activity and vitals captured by your smart wearable device so that you can keep a track of your health effectively.

Use this Fastrack Smart World application to set up and manage the following features:

- Connection/disconnection with the smartwatch
- Software/firmware updates
- Control/modify smartwatch settings
- Access health feature settings and data like Heart Rate, SpO2, Blood Pressure, etc. (non-medical use, only for general fitness/wellness purpose)
- Turn on/off or modify notification access
- Seamlessly sync your my fitness, multi-sport and sleep data
- Sync favourite contacts from the application to watch
- Sync your health data with Google Fit
- Don’t miss out on important updates. Allow the app to send call (Phone Call permission required), SMS and third-party app notifications to the watch so that you can stay on top of your game.
- Reply with SMS while rejecting call (Send SMS permission required).
- You can also manage the list of apps that you want to receive notifications from - you’re in control, always!
- Get weather updates by allowing the app to detect your location, so that you can see forecasts.

Install the Fastrack Smart World application on your mobile device, then pair your smart wearable device via Bluetooth to enjoy all its features.

Settings and features provided by the Fastrack Smart World application are only available when your smartwatch is connected to your mobile device. Features will not work properly without a stable connection between your smartwatch and your mobile device.

The Fastrack Smart World application supports the following devices:

-Revolt FS1
-Limitless FS1
-Reflex Nitro
-Reflex Beat Plus
-Reflex Vox2
-Reflex Vybe
-Reflex Play Plus
-Reflex Play
-Reflex Curv
-Reflex Watch
-Reflex 2C
-Reflex 3.0

*Some features are device-specific and will be supported only with specific devices.
